sentences.en: Both parties use computers to dig up dirt on their opponents.
sentences.cn: 双方都用电脑搜集对手的丑事。

sentences.en: Can you dig the material out of the archives?
sentences.cn: 你能从档案里把这个材料查出来 吗 ?

sentences.en: Cassandra silenced him with a sharp dig in the small of the back.
sentences.cn: 卡桑德拉在他腰背上狠狠地戳了一下让他闭上了嘴。

sentences.en: Dig down about 6 inches.
sentences.cn: 往下挖大约六英寸深。

sentences.en: Dig it up once the foliage has died down.
sentences.cn: 叶子掉光后就把它挖出来。

sentences.en: Dig out and burn infected canes.
sentences.cn: 把受感染的甘蔗挖出来烧掉。

sentences.en: Dig over any ground that is clear of crops and plants.
sentences.cn: 把没种庄稼和植物的土地都深翻一遍。

sentences.en: Dig the soil over thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 把土地彻底犁开。

sentences.en: freshly dug carrots
sentences.cn: 刚挖出来的胡萝卜

sentences.en: He has been digging into the local archives.
sentences.cn: 他一直在仔细研究当地的档案。

sentences.en: officials dug their heels in on particular points.
sentences.cn: 在一些特定问题上，官员们拒不让步。

sentences.en: officials dug their heels in on particular points.
sentences.cn: 在一些特定问题上，官员们拒不让步。

sentences.en: officials dug their heels in on particular points.
sentences.cn: 在一些特定问题上，官员们拒不让步。

sentences.en: Pull up a chair and dig in!
sentences.cn: 拉把椅子过来开吃吧！

sentences.en: She couldn't resist a dig at Dave after his unfortunate performance.
sentences.cn: 戴夫糟糕的表演结束后，她忍不住想挖苦他一番。

sentences.en: The children helped their parents to dig up potatoes.
sentences.cn: 孩子们帮他们的父母挖马铃薯.

sentences.en: The customer will not dig down for such food.
sentences.cn: 那个顾客不会为这种食物掏腰包的.

sentences.en: The dentist commenced to dig, drill and finally fill the offending tooth.
sentences.cn: 牙医开始在那颗有问题的牙齿上挖洞，钻孔，直到最后把它补好。

sentences.en: The horse started galloping the moment I gave it a good dig.
sentences.cn: 我猛戳了马一下,它就奔驰起来了.

sentences.en: We should be able to dig up enough money for your ticket.
sentences.cn: 我们应该能够筹集到足够的钱供你买票.

sentences.en: Why did you dig out all these old magazines?
sentences.cn: 你把这些旧杂志翻出来做 什么 ?

sentences.en: You would have to dig up the plant yourself.
sentences.cn: 你得自己把那株植物挖出来。

words.tran_cn: 挖掘机；挖掘者；矿工；以色相骗钱的女人；扒手
挖掘，发掘（dig的现在分词形式）
挖，翻土（dig的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.phrase: dig a hole for oneself (或 dig oneself into a hole)
phrases.tran_cn: 使自己处于难堪（或受局限）的境地

phrases.phrase: dig in one's heels (或 toes, feet)
dig the dirt (或 dig up dirt)
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)发现（或揭露）有损（某人）的消息，讲（某人）坏话

trans.tran_cn: 考古发掘，戳，租住的房间，挖苦
trans.tran_en: a joke or remark that you make to annoy or criticize someone

trans.tran_cn: 挖，掘，戳，掏，研究，脱身，喜欢
trans.tran_en: to move earth, snow etc, or to make a hole in the ground, using a  spade  or your hands
